Vulois/Terminess/Bronco/Octociz


Vulois finds Hell Beast and asks him about Terminess.

"Hey, boss! I've found a new Predacon and she's a real genious. She 
would love to help our cause. She only needs a small lab. I was 
wondering if we could set her up with something?"

______________________________________________________________________

Terminess is walking around the Pred base. She has been set up with 
her own quarters. She's beggining to like life here. Maybe she 
doesn't have to go back. No! She needs to. Her group can't survive 
without her. And what about Vulois? He's been really nice to ger. 
Anything she wanted she could have from him. She only hopes she can 
get her lab. Maybe Vulois could join her on Cybertron. He would make 
a reat partner. Only time will tell if this is his true persona.

Terminess continues down the Pred base.

______________________________________________________________________

Brix Prime has been waiting on the moon for days now. After giving 
the last functional pod to his crew member Octociz, he has been 
waiting for a Maximal rescue ship. After his ship, the Mirorition, 
crashed on the moon, only he and Octociz survived. Now he needs to 
take things into his own hands. He has been building his own small 
ship from scattered parts. Now he gets to see whether or not it 
works. He re-wires the electronics so that the Bay doors open, and he 
fires up his ship. It seems to be working fine. He pulls it out of 
the bay, and is flying in space. He aims the ship towards past Earth.

"Octociz, here I come."

As he nears the atmosphere, he realizes a fatal problem: the outer 
hull is not strong enough to take an entry to an atmosphere! His ship 
begins to burn up. He tries to hold it as long as he can. He has lost 
all steering. His ship makes a violent crash right into earth.

In a way, Brix Prime, great Maximal captain and leader, died in that 
crash. His logic and identity circuts were almost completly 
destroyed. He had taken a DNA scanner from one of the bad pods, and 
it began scanning. Only a large Bull which had been eating grass when 
he crahed was in the area. When the ship opened, out popped the 
meanest looking bot that ever lived. His muscleds were huge. He had 
gigantic horns. He had a shotgun blaster. This was not Brix Prime. He 
was dead, ore at least sleeping deep inside the spark. This bot 
didn't do much speaking. He shot first, asked questions later. He did 
not remember being a Maximal. He was a renengade. By himself, selling 
his destructive skills to whoever needed it.

Brix Prime the Maximal was dead. Bronco the transformer had been born.

______________________________________________________________________

Octociz was on look out duty, partolling a few miles out from the 
Ark. He could not believe the violence here. As soon as he got here, 
he was invloved in a huge battle close to home. What's worse, was 
that he went through alot of torment to get here. Saying goodbye to 
his family. Watching all his friends die. Looking at Brix Prime's 
face when he launched the pod. And for this? So that he could destory 
Predacons? It's madness. And what happened to Brix Prime? Is he still 
up on the moon, waiting for a rescue mission? Is he all right? Is 
he....dead?

Before that though could go any further, Octociz saw a ship, 
spiraling out of control. It crashed violently into the earth. 
Octociz radioed in.

"This is Octociz. A strange ship just crahed. It's not a pod! I'm 
going to go check it out. If I need back-up I'll call for it."

Octociz took off towards the crashed ship.
